1.name: A simple quest
1.description: The lava slimes are causing so much trouble these days!
1.taskDescription: Lava slimes live near lava holes. Get rid of them!

tasks.progress: Have you slain the lava slimes, %class%?

2.name: What next
2.description: You are a nice %sex%! You killed the slimes, tell it to Nefag!
2.taskDescription: Nefag is a forester standing on the remainings of the forest. Talk to him!

3.name: The lonely forester
3.description: I am so lonely here. I am dreaming of Diana all day. Bring my letter to her!
3.taskDescription: Diana likes walking near the corn fields. Find her and hand over the letter!
3.completion: Oh, Nefag loves me? I love him too!

4.name: A forester without job
4.description: Help the forester to find a job!
4.taskDescription: Cacal can help finding a job. Speak to her!
4.completion: He can work in my shop.

5.name: The queen bee
5.description: I need an amulet made of the sting of the queen bee. I'll pay you well, if you help me.
5.taskDescription: Kill the queen bee and bring their sting!

tasks.progress: Have you found the queen bee? It is the biggest one with golden sting!

6.name: Strange guests
6.taskDescription: There are a bunch of lava slimes eastward. Find them!

7.name: Trust issues
7.description: I am not sure if we can trust you. Answer me: are the lava slimes your friends?
7.completion: The lava slimes are your enemies? I was hoping you'd say that. Come, I have some tasks for you.

9.name: Poor's feast
9.description: Hello, %class%! Look at these vegetables! They look fine, but do they taste good as well?
9.completion: Well, I think I will give it a try.

11.name: The summoner
11.description: So you want to know who summons the golems, right? I know an ancient elixir which reveals the summoner of any summoned creature. Maybe I can make it If you bring me the ingredients.
11.taskDescription: Bring the ingredients of the elixir!

tasks.progress: Where is my Pyrite? I mean, the ingredients?

12.name: Revealing the summoner
12.description: Take this elixir, it can reveal who summoned the golems!
12.taskDescription: Use the Elixir of Revealing on a Dirt Golem!

tasks.progress: Do you know, who summoned the golems?

13.name: Unusual Noises
13.completion: There is a huge sawmill in the place of the forest. There are some guards around.
13.description: Young %sex%! Can you help me? I heard strange noises from the northern forest. Maybe some danger is lurking around.

tasks.progress: The noises are getting stronger and stronger...

14.name: Taking back the forest
14.completion: I have killed some, but there are more and more...
14.description:
Oh no, the forest! I should have take care more! But my power is running out...
Whoever have done this, should be punished!
14.taskDescription: Eliminate the guards, whoever they are!

tasks.progress: Come back, when you eliminated the guards!

15.name: Meeting the Wise
15.description: There are more and more? It seems these guards are some kind of summoned creatures. But we cannot stop them until we know who controls them. Maybe Albertus can help us, %name%, he is a wise wizard, who lives in this forest.
